All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AddPartController
The AddPartController class controls the behavior of the Add Part form in the Inventory Management System.
AddProductController
The AddProductController class controls the behavior of the Add Product form in the Inventory Management System.
InHouse
The InHouse class represents a part that is manufactured in-house.
Inventory
The Inventory class manages the parts and products in the inventory system.
Main
The Main class serves as the entry point for "Inventory Management System" application.
MainFormController
The MainFormController class is responsible for controlling the main form of the Inventory Management System.
ModifyPartController
Controller class for modifying a part in the inventory management system.
ModifyProductController
Controller class for modifying products in the inventory management system.
Outsourced
The Outsourced class represents a part that is obtained from an external company.
Part
 
Product
The Product class represents a product in the inventory management system.
